itemDescription: British civil servant and transport executive (1919-2012)

wikipedia_page.main: Walter Patrick Shovelton, CB, CMG (18 August 1919 – 20 January 2012) was a British civil servant and subsequently a transport executive.

response: * Patrick Shovelton, one of Whitehall's most formidable international negotiators
*Patrick Shovelton (1919–2012), British civil servant and transport executive

Helena Shovelton is a daughter of Denis Richards, OBE, the official historian of the Royal Air Force.Patrick Shovelton: Senior civil servant and obituarist for 'The Independent', The Independent, London, 3 February 2012 She was educated at the North London Collegiate School and Regent Street Polytechnic; later she gained an MBA from Strathclyde University. She married Patrick Shovelton in 1968; he died in 2012.SHOVELTON, Dame Helena, Who's Who 2012, A & C Black, 2012; online edn, Oxford University Press, Dec 2011, accessed 5 March 2012
*Patrick Shovelton, 92, British civil servant and obituarist.
